meanings.definition: To advance or raise in rank or position
meanings.sent1: She was promoted to team leader for her hard work.
meanings.sent2: The dedicated employee was promoted to a higher position.
meanings.sent3: Her promotion to manager brought a big smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: His skills promoted him to the top of the company ladder.
meanings.sent5: The promotion ceremony made her feel proud and accomplished.

meanings.definition: To encourage the sales, acceptance, etc., of a product
meanings.sent1: The company promoted their new product through social media.
meanings.sent2: Advertisements are used to promote various products to consumers.
meanings.sent3: The catchy jingle promoted the new cereal in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: Their marketing strategy promoted the brand as a household name.
meanings.sent5: Promoting the product during prime time TV shows increased its popularity.

meanings.definition: To help or encourage to exist or flourish
meanings.sent1: Watering the plants regularly promotes their growth.
meanings.sent2: Sunlight and nutrients promote the health of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The supportive community promotes a sense of belonging.
meanings.sent4: Positive feedback promotes confidence in students.
meanings.sent5: Encouraging words promote a positive mindset in individuals.
